When he arrived, Blackfang found siref cursing at the gun turret.

Blackfang: Woah! Take it easy, Siref! Don't blow up the whole thing!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14" <black_ben14@h...> wrote:
> Siref:Understood.
> 
> He returned at the turret.And a little spark came from it.
> 
> Siref:Damn!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Blackfang: All right. I'll join you in a nano!
> > 
> > He heads to the turrets.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14" <black_ben14@h...> wrote:
> > > Siref had a little smile when he heard the new name of 
> > > Blackknight "Yeah Blackfang I'm checking the turret defense on 
the
